This is a Vue.js NPS (Net Promoter Score) survey application for driving school satisfaction research.

## Project Structure
- Vue 3 with Composition API
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Modern UI components
- Form validation
- JSON data submission to n8n webhook

## Key Features
- 11-question satisfaction survey
- NPS rating scale (0-10)
- Likert scale responses
- Multiple choice options
- Text area for comments
- Mobile-optimized interface
- Data validation before submission

## API Integration
- Submits survey results as JSON to n8n webhook endpoint
- Handles success/error responses
- User feedback on submission status
